content: knitted jumper in drops fabel and drops brushed alpaca silk the piece is worked top down in stocking stitch with european/diagonal shoulders and double neck sizes s - xxxl drops design pattern fa-536 yarn group c + a or d **sizes** s - m - l - xl - xxl - xxxl **yarn** drops fabel from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 200-250-250-300-300-350 g colour 602 silver fox drops brushed alpaca silk from garnstudio belongs to yarn group c 150-175-200-200-225-250 g colour 01 off white **needles** drops circular needles size 6 mm length 40 cm and 80 cm drops circular needles size 5 mm length 40 cm and 80 cm drops double pointed needles size 6 mm drops double pointed needles size 5 mm the technique magic loop can be used you then only need 80 cm circular needle in each size **knitting gauge** 14 stitches in width and 16 row in height with stocking stitch and 1 strand of each quality = 10 x 10 cm
